version_description:
1. Add: album support list and grid display
2. Repair the abnormal large image browsing

1. Support view and edit video EXIF metadata
2. Support for deleting photos in the app

1. Fix the problem about syncing date and gps information to apple album
2. Optimize the crash problem

1.Support Dark Mode.
2.Fix the problem that sometimes failed in deleting location and date.

1. Add template function
2. Interface UI optimization
3. Fix some bugs

1. Photos can be arranged by date for quick and easy searching
2. Performance optimization, faster processing of large numbers of pictures at the same time
3. Optimize GPS information display
4. Japanese translation optimization, especially thanks to the translation provided by enthusiastic users (MIYOSHI TAKESHI)

1. Fix the problem that the video location modification does not take effect
2. Added Korean, French, Spanish, Russian

1. Added Italian, Portuguese, Hindi, Dutch, Polish, Thai
2. Optimize iPhone X interface adaptation problem
3. New list view
4. Add photos sorted by earliest time/latest time

1. Added support for modifying focal length
2. Added support for viewing IOS hidden album photos
3. Fix the problem that the interface cannot be closed when viewing EXIF information in the system album
4. Fix the problem of MOV video opening crash
5. Fix the problem of incorrect display of exposure time
1. Fix the problem that the year cannot be edited (appeared in V1.5.5)

1. Added satellite map, which can be switched on the setting interface
2. Newly increase the function of adding geographic location by map
3. Added "Back to current location" function on the map
4. Added "Back to Bottom" shortcut in the photo list
5. Newly added photo resource (Assets) list display and sharing
6. Added IOS metadata editing
7. Optimize photo selection, when returning to the photo list, keep the last selected position
8. Optimized the problem of refreshing the photo list after modifying the time information of the photo
9. Optimize the loading speed of the photo list
10. Fixed the bug of displaying errors when switching languages
11. Fix the issue of photo exif information loss after sharing

Most of our updates come from usersâ€™ suggestions and feedback. If you have any questions or suggestions in using the software, please feel free to contact us: lilliancream@163.com

1. Added time option to the template
2. Fix the problem of incorrect display of favorites
1. Optimize the font effect of EXIF interface

1. Added: View the EXIF information of the new video in the system photo (select video-share-power exif)
2. Added: When viewing EXIF in the system photo, a button to jump to the APP is added
3. New addition: the display of new videos in each album in the APP
4. New: When editing the EXIF of photos/videos, you can choose to save as a copy (open in the settings)
5. Optimization: the focal length field supports to the decimal point
6. Optimization: the display of videos in the album in the APP is displayed separately from the photos
7. BUG repair: fix the problem that the focal length and ISO are not saved in the template function

1. Fix: failed to authorize some photos
2. Fix: The problem of large buffer after editing video EXIF
3. Newly added: add clearing of video cache in settings
1. Fix the problem that CR2 photos may not be able to view information
